title: Calories in a Garlic Clove
meta_description: Discover calories in a garlic clove, including carbs, protein, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown per clove or 100g basis.
assumptions: Average raw garlic clove (~3g), peeled, no added oil or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by clove size, freshness, and preparation; values are approximate. Check sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One average garlic clove has about 4 kcal and negligible fat or protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Minced and saut√©ed in 1 tsp oil

faqs.q: How many calories in one garlic clove?
faqs.a: About 4 kcal for an average raw clove.

faqs.q: Does garlic have carbs or fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, ~1g carbs and 0.1g fiber per clove, mostly from complex carbs.

faqs.q: Calories in roasted vs raw garlic?
faqs.a: Roasted adds minimal calories (~5 kcal), but oil can increase it significantly.

faqs.q: How much protein in a garlic clove?
faqs.a: Only about 0.2g, making it not a protein source.
